A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was in a crowded theater in Hollywood\, lots of young kids\, the movie was two and a half hours long\, there was not a peep from anyone the whole movie\, that says a lot.

I have been a Star Wars fan from the first scenes of the first film\, so for me this was as good as it gets. 

The casting was great\, and to see Mark Hamill again was a real treat. 

There is a whole new generation falling in love with Star Wars\, that's fantastic.
